member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.Products.ProductViewModel.ModifiedDate
member.summary: Date and time the record was last updated.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderDetailModel.SalesOrderId
member.summary: Primary key. Foreign key to SalesOrderHeader.SalesOrderID.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderDetailModel.SalesOrderDetailId
member.summary: Primary key. One incremental unique number per product sold.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderDetailModel.CarrierTrackingNumber
member.summary: Shipment tracking number supplied by the shipper.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderDetailModel.OrderQty
member.summary: Quantity ordered per product.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderDetailModel.ProductId
member.summary: Product sold to customer. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderDetailModel.SpecialOfferId
member.summary: Promotional code. Foreign key to SpecialOffer.SpecialOfferID.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderDetailModel.UnitPrice
member.summary: Selling price of a single product.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderDetailModel.UnitPriceDiscount
member.summary: Discount amount.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderDetailModel.ModifiedDate
member.summary: Date and time the record was last updated.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderHeaderModel.Id
member.summary: Primary key.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderHeaderModel.RevisionNumber
member.summary: Incremental number to track changes to the sales order over time.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderHeaderModel.OrderDate
member.summary: Dates the sales order was created.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderHeaderModel.DueDate
member.summary: Date the order is due to the customer.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderHeaderModel.ShipDate
member.summary: Date the order was shipped to the customer.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderHeaderModel.Status
member.summary: Order current status. 1 = In process; 2 = Approved; 3 = Backordered; 4 = Rejected; 5 = Shipped; 6 = Cancelled

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderHeaderModel.OnlineOrderFlag
member.summary: 0 = Order placed by sales person. 1 = Order placed online by customer.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderHeaderModel.SalesOrderNumber
member.summary: Unique sales order identification number.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderHeaderModel.PurchaseOrderNumber
member.summary: Customer purchase order number reference.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderHeaderModel.AccountNumber
member.summary: Financial accounting number reference.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderHeaderModel.CustomerCode
member.summary: Customer identification number. Foreign key to Customer.BusinessEntityID.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderHeaderModel.SalesPersonId
member.summary: Sales person who created the sales order. Foreign key to SalesPerson.BusinessEntityID.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderHeaderModel.TerritoryId
member.summary: Territory in which the sale was made. Foreign key to SalesTerritory.SalesTerritoryID.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderHeaderModel.BillToAddress
member.summary: Customer billing address. Foreign key to Address.AddressID.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderHeaderModel.ShipToAddress
member.summary: Customer shipping address. Foreign key to Address.AddressID.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderHeaderModel.ShipMethodId
member.summary: Shipping method. Foreign key to ShipMethod.ShipMethodID.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderHeaderModel.CreditCardId
member.summary: Credit card identification number. Foreign key to CreditCard.CreditCardID.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderHeaderModel.CreditCardApprovalCode
member.summary: Approval code provided by the credit card company.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderHeaderModel.CurrencyRateId
member.summary: Currency exchange rate used. Foreign key to CurrencyRate.CurrencyRateID.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderHeaderModel.SubTotal
member.summary: Sales subtotal. Computed as SUM(SalesOrderDetail.LineTotal)for the appropriate SalesOrderID.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderHeaderModel.TaxAmt
member.summary: Tax amount.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderHeaderModel.Freight
member.summary: Shipping cost.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderHeaderModel.TotalDue
member.summary: Total due from customer. Computed as Subtotal + TaxAmt + Freight.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderHeaderModel.Note
member.summary: Sales representative comments.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderHeaderModel.Rowguid
member.summary: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

member.name: P:API_CRM.ViewModels.SaleOrders.SalesOrderHeaderModel.ModifiedDate
member.summary: Date and time the record was last updated.
